article: This is my beautiful home . There is a small garden in front of my house . There are many beautiful flowers in the garden . Behind my house there is a big tree . Near the tree , you can see a garage . My father ' s beautiful car is in it now . On the first floor , there is a large living room , a dining room , a kitchen and a bathroom . I like watching TV in the living room . On the second floor , there is a small study room and two bedrooms . I love playing with the computer in my study . What a nice home ! I like it very much .
